bug.title: Unable to move history page
bug.body: 1. Select an item in list. - https://service-knowledge.support-project.org/open.knowledge/histories/19 2. Display error message. ```json { children: [ ], code: 400, message: "param is invalid.", result: null, status: 2 } ``` Beccause URL is invalid. `/open.knowledge/history/19&page=0&history_no=2` Correctly `/open.knowledge/history/19?page=0&history_no=2`

bug.title: Language - variable name spelling mistake
bug.body: Hello, this wasn't a bug but just a little spelling mistake on a variable name in the files : - appresource.properties - appresource_ja.properties They're a variable named "knowledge.auth.label.request.init.passwoed", I think the right name should be "knowledge.auth.label.request.init.password" By the case, you made a very good job, all seems to be very clean and pleasant to read! Thank you!

"" : ": " + title)); BufferedImage img = new BufferedImage(width, height, BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB); //ImageIOUtil.writeImage(img, outputDir.getAbsolutePath() + "/" + (slideNo) + ".png", 300); super.writeImage(img, outputDir.getAbsolutePath() + "/" + (slideNo) + ".png"); slideNo++; } ``` ã¨ãªã£ã¦ã„ã¦ã€Slide ã®å†…å®¹ã‚’ BufferedImage ã«åæ˜ ã—ã¦ã„ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«æ€ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ãã“ã§ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å¤‰ãˆãŸã‚‰ã‚¹ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ‰ãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã¯ãªã£ãŸã®ã§ã™ãŒã€ä»Šåº¦ã¯ #509 ã§æŒ‡æ‘˜ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªäº‹è±¡ãŒèµ·ãã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ ```java for (Slide<?, ?> slide : slides) { String title = slide.getTitle(); System.out.println("Rendering slide " + slideNo + (title == null ? "" : ": " + title)); BufferedImage img = new BufferedImage(width, height, BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB); Graphics2D graphics = img.createGraphics(); graphics.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_ANTIALIASING, RenderingHints.VALUE_ANTIALIAS_ON); graphics.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_RENDERING, RenderingHints.VALUE_RENDER_QUALITY); graphics.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_INTERPOLATION, RenderingHints.VALUE_INTERPOLATION_BICUBIC); graphics.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_FRACTIONALMETRICS, RenderingHints.VALUE_FRACTIONALMETRICS_ON); slide.draw(graphics); img.flush(); //ImageIOUtil.writeImage(img, outputDir.getAbsolutePath() + "/" + (slideNo) + ".png", 300); super.writeImage(img, outputDir.getAbsolutePath() + "/" + (slideNo) + ".png"); graphics.dispose(); slideNo++; } ``` ãŠãã‚‰ã d15d24aaf70cf1d7ba36d62d7da400eb908b3ee3 ã§ä¿®æ­£ã™ã‚‹å‰ã®å†…å®¹ã«ä¸€éƒ¨æˆ»ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã†ã‹ãªã¨æ€ã†ã®ã§ã™ãŒã€ã“ã¡ã‚‰ PR ãŠé€ã‚Šã—ãŸæ–¹ãŒè‰¯ã„ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ã‹ï¼Ÿ

bug.title: default publication range in usermenu is different from real one
bug.body: ### default publication range default publication range after user created is `private` (ref below). ![default_publication_range_02](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/14275619/26573724/c7b542c2-4559-11e7-91cb-796f2247efed.png) ### in usermenu range but in usermenu, selected `public (to all users)` initially (ref below). ![default_publication_range_01](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/14275619/26573744/d5f3f50e-4559-11e7-959a-acacd0480092.png) ### not intuitive? if no operation in this usermenu, range is still `private` of course. so users must push `save` button on purpose. I think this non intuitive. How is this? ### ps `Knowledge` is very very indeed sexy product! thanks! :-)

bug.title: Knowledge freeze while previewing markdown doccument
bug.body: Hi, I hosted a knowledge base system with Knowledge Docker, and I posted a markdown document basically transferred from a wiki website, but Knowledge stop responding when I tried to preview or open the document after saving the document to Knowledge. The attachment is the document that cause the freeze, and you might want to take a look. Since I cannot upload files to this repository, I will provide the link from my google drive. https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bzfel_IWZzflT1pNblN4ZFFJY1k/view?usp=sharing Thanks for all the hard works! This system is great and does all the jobs I need!
